description:
Stay composed on cold winter belays, backcountry ski descents and Big Mountain adventures. With recycled Stratus™ insulation and Gore-Tex Infinium™ fabrics, the Khroma Kharve Jacket is ready for the mountain and everything that comes with it.

The Khroma Kharve Jacket uses 30D Gore-Tex® Infinium™ Windstopper fabric for flexible weatherproof comfort and advanced moisture management during self-propelled backcountry ski tours. To cope with damp, changeable mountain conditions, the jacket is also filled with synthetic Stratus™ polyester sheet insulation. Produced using recycled fibres from post-consumer PET bottles, it combines inherent softness with an outstanding warmth to weight ratio and excellent insulation when wet. Other ascent-inspired ski mountaineering features include a helmet-compatible hood with wired peak, a double-ended front zip, multiple internal pockets and a fully adjustable hem for a tailored fit.

Designed for warmth at the summit and comfort on the descent, the Khroma Kharve Jacket leverages decades of applied mountain expertise to bring mountaineering know-how to your off-piste adventures.
name: Rab Khroma Kharve Jacket - Mens
